basics.name: Tao XU
basics.label: Associate Professor
basics.summary: Tao Xu is an Associate Professor in the School of Computer Science at Northwestern Polytechnical University. He received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from the Northwestern Polytechnical University in 2014. His research interests include Affective Computing, Artificial Intelligence, and Cognitive Psychology.
